thread.title: Exceptional on ALL FRONTS!
thread.title_full: Exceptional on ALL FRONTS! - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Robert D
title: Exceptional on ALL FRONTS!
text: I don't know where to begin. This hotel is in the PERFECT location and walking distance to pretty much everything AND several subway stops! The hotel is beautiful and the team (every single person we encountered) was extremely helpful, friendly, and nice. Special shout out to Nick and Milton who helped make our stay really special!!!! I will definitely stay here again.
